author: brent.allsop
content:
I’m thinking we need to make an “EIP Single Source” google doc where we discuss at least all of the following sources of EIP truth with lots of duplicates:

https://eips.ethereum.org/
https://ethereum.org/en/eips/
https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blob/master/README.md
https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1

The purpose will be to list issues, propose solutions, and track consensus.

If there are any other sources of EIP truth, or if there is already a location where this kind of work has already been started, point me there so we can leverage that rather than start from scratch.

author: gcolvin
content: I fear that will be yet another source to wonder about.  The README already describes and links to the other to documents you mention, as the README for a repo should.

author: brent.allsop
content:
Oh, yes, sorry.  I completely agree.
The only purpose for the google doc is just a temporary working doc to co-ordinate cleanup efforts, not a source of any kind of EIP truth.
